alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 7:33PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Pushmataha and southwestern Latimer Counties through 800 PM CST... At 733 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of Dunbar to 5 miles northwest of Rattan. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Clayton Lake State Park... Stanley... Snow... Nashoba... Dunbar... Tuskahoma... Eubanks... Sardis... Finley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Oklahoma.
